column1: #Text=Sokka says : " Everyone , that volcano is gon na blow any second !
#Text=" Katara says : " If you wo n't listen to him , maybe you 'll listen to me .
#Text=I want to believe Aunt Wu and her predictions as much as you do , but my brother and Aang saw the lava with their own eyes .
#Text=" Calm man says : " Well , I heard Aunt Wu 's prediction with my own ears .
#Text=" Aang says : " Please listen to us !
#Text=And we have to get out of here !
#Text=You ca n't rely on Aunt Wu 's prediction , you have to take fate into your own hands !
